content: Phase 1.1: Define MathpixPipelineStage enum in pipeline.py:35+
Phase 1.2: Define ReviewSeverity enum in pipeline.py

Phase 1.5: Extend StageEvidence model with correction_patches, final_confidence fields
Phase 2.1: Create new file pipeline_actions.py with module docstring
Phase 2.2: Define BlockerDetails and AmbiguityResolution Pydantic models
Phase 2.3: Define AlignmentBlockerResult ObjectType
Phase 2.4: Define AmbiguityResolutionResult ObjectType
Phase 2.5: Implement alignment.blocker_detected ActionType (hazardous)
Phase 2.6: Implement semantic.resolve_ambiguity ActionType (hazardous)
Phase 2.7: Implement pipeline.advance_stage ActionType (non-hazardous)
Phase 2.8: Add __all__ exports to pipeline_actions.py
Phase 3.1: Add alignment.blocker_detected rule to governance/actions.yaml
Phase 3.2: Add semantic.resolve_ambiguity rule to governance/actions.yaml
Phase 3.3: Add pipeline.advance_stage rule to governance/actions.yaml
Phase 3.4: Add vision.low_confidence auto-trigger rule (confidence < 0.5)
Phase 3.5: Update lib/oda/ontology/actions/__init__.py with pipeline_actions import
Phase 4.1: Verify all imports work without circular dependency
Phase 4.2: Run Python syntax check on all modified files
Phase 4.3: Update plan file status to COMPLETED
